title: Escaping Bronze City (Need a Duo partner)
body: Bronze really isnt that hard to escape, what makes it so fucking hard and tiresome is the retards who intentionally feed or DC leaving me with a team in disarray. Looking for a Duo who's also in Bronze, however, is good enough to climb. Skype would be preferable to make communication easier.

replies.body: Hey, I'd be happy to duo with you, I'm I'm the same boat.  My username is Axivia, I'll add you :) I main support and adc.

Also looking for the same...
will play {{champion:201}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:110}}
Hit me up ig, im usually always online!
